DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect Spanish Black Radish phase I phase II enzyme activity healthy adult male . The primary objective determine effect phase I phase II enzyme activity measure plasma urine acetaminophen metabolite concentration prior 28 day supplementation period Spanish black radish product .
DOC.brief_title: An Open Label Pilot Study Evaluate Efficacy Spanish Black Radish Induction Phase I Phase II Enzymes
